name: getComplianceSummarySLAV1
description: Returns the compliance summary information for all protected objects based on whether the last expected snapshot was successful. This requirement is based on the SLA Domain assigned to the objects.

snapshot_range.description: An SLA Domain-based range of snapshots. Compliance is calculated for snapshots in the range.

$ul: **numberOfInComplianceSnapshots**: Number of objects in compliance based on the snapshot range filter.
**numberOfOutOfComplianceSnapshots**: Number of objects out of compliance based on the snapshot range filter.
**percentOfInComplianceSnapshots**: Percent of objects in compliance based on the snapshot range filter.
**percentOfOutOfComplianceSnapshots**: Percent of objects out of compliance based on the snapshot range filter.
**snapshotRange**: Specifies a number of snapshots. Compliance for each object is calculated for the most recent snapshots, up to the specified number.
**totalProtected**: Total number of protected objects based on the snapshot range filter.
**updatedTime**: The timestamp of the most recent successful update to the compliance summary stats.
